short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save items you love to URSTYLE.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The URSTYLE Clipper Tool is the easiest way to add images from accross the web to URSTYLE. After adding the extension click the URSTYLE Clipper button on the browser to save images from your favourite stores, fashion blogs and other websites that inspire your style.
